"Design a washing machine that uses sound waves to clean clothes without water or detergent."
"Create a smart washing machine that can learn your laundry habits and adjust its settings accordingly."
"Develop a portable washing machine that can be used in remote locations where access to running water is limited."
"Innovate on the design of washing machines by creating a machine that folds up into a small package when not in use."
"Create a washing machine that generates electricity from the movement of clothes during the wash cycle."
